```{r, include=FALSE}
library(fishSimGTG)
library(dplyr)
library(here)
library(kableExtra)
library(prettydoc)

grabber <-  lapply(
  X = list.files("objects/"), 
  FUN = function(X){
    readRDS(here("objects", X))
                   })

src <- lapply(
  X = 1:NROW(grabber), 
  FUN = function(X) {
    knitr::knit_expand(
      file = here::here("child", "template.Rmd"), 
      lh = grabber[[X]]
    )
  }
)
```


# Explore Life Histories

`r knitr::knit(text = unlist(src))`
